text: Kindberg is a municipality in Bruck-Mürzzuschlag in the Austrian state of Styria. Its famous landmark is the Kindberger Zunftbaum, a 30-metre high wooden pole on the main square. Kindberg is in the valley of the Mürz. It is about 17 km northeast of Bruck an der Mur and about 20 km southwest of Mürzzuschlag. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Settlements in Styria
title: Kindberg
